Module ing.sw.puddu.rios.rizzo
Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

Class Model

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.model.Model
  • public class Model
extends java.lang.Object
    Master class of the model package, exposes most methods and is the head of the reference structure of the model package

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void addObserver​(FeedObserver obs)
      add an observer to the feed
      void addPlayer​(Player player)
      relies on the controller to only add valid players adds the player in its right place in the ArrayList publishes the notify for all known names so that the last client can know every other client that has already posted their name, possibly even before the last one joined
      boolean allWorkersPlaced()
      returns true if all the workers have been placed
      void deleteFiles()
      deletes persistence files for this game
      void executeAction​(int id, Action action)
      executes the action on the board and saves it in the current turn
      void executeSetupAction​(int id, SetupAction setupAction)
      MAY ADVANCE THE TURN updates the board with the setup action, adds it to the game, and if the setup turn is complete advances the turn also notifies the action through the feed
      boolean fullEquals​(Model that)
      deep comparison that sets off comparisons of all the objects that should be restored after loading a previous game

      waits for a predetermined amount of time

      • save

        public void save()
        instantiates a PersistenceGame, and saves both that and the TurnArchive to a json file the files that are saved have a name that is non ambiguous for any given set of players

      • saveName

        java.lang.String saveName()
        retrieves the names of the players, and concatenates them to act a suffix for the file names
        Returns:
        a concatenation of the names of the players, sorted alphabetically
